body:
Holy shit this was funny af. Anyone else notice that Among Us gif in that text bubble?
Anyway happy juicing. Hope you all milk your snakes today.

xqcL
Guys stop hating not everyone understands Japanese!!! At least i know what is going on!!
Thaks for this translation but are you sure you correctly translated "This is communism and I am the Tzar"?. May be it was "This is autocracy and I am the Tzar!"
Come on, Mordakai.  The point of a John K Peta work isn't the translation.  It's to wince at the body horror.
the translation is turning me off. I hope whoever translated this will pass away before April.23rd.2022
Wtf is wrong with this translation? XD it's so fucking awful HAHAHAHA
lets hope twitch phrases never be used in actual conversations. that was painful and cringe to read.
The dialog is fucking awful xD
Which twitchtard user decided to translate this?
